title: Gollum, Mad Thing (10R21)
text:
Set:	Mount Doom
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion
Strength:	5
Vitality:	4
Site:	3
Game Text:	To assign Gollum to a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must make Gollum strength +3 until the regroup phase or add a burden.
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Gollum's game text does not apply if a Shadow player assigns him to a skirmish.
